name: AndroidManifest System Use Permission Checking
description: This app uses critical permissions that allow the management of filesystem and packages (e.g. `"android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS"` and `"android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES"`). The use of this permissions should be confined only to system apps by device manufacturer or Google. If not, it may be a malicious app.
remediation: Please carefully revise the use of this permissions. If you are uncertain on the usage, please do not install this application.

references.text: Further information on permissions can be found in the official documentation [[1]].
